p: Different reports on SARS-CoV-2 impact on neurologic patients have been published in different countries with unprecedented speed and collaboration among centres, but several questions regarding NMD patients remain unanswered. Given the possibility of subsequent waves of the pandemic, we will need a robust reorganization of neuromuscular centres, where the role of telemedicine will be prominent. We will have to stay vigilant on COVID-19 infection- and COVID-19 therapy-related NMD complications, patients with pre-existing NM diseases and new drugs that may worsen specific NMD conditions.
